degreeTracks.name: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics (BS Math)
degreeTracks.description: A rigorous undergraduate program providing a strong foundation in pure mathematics.

electiveGroups.name: Advanced Pure Mathematics Electives
electiveGroups.description: Choose 2 courses from advanced topics in Algebra, Analysis, or Geometry.

electiveGroups.name: Applied Mathematics Electives
electiveGroups.description: Choose 1 course from Numerical Analysis, Optimization, or Probability/Statistics.

degreeTracks.prerequisitesOverview: Core foundational courses in Calculus, Linear Algebra, and Proofs are essential for advanced study. Specific prerequisites are detailed per course.

capstone.description: An independent research project or thesis on an advanced mathematical topic, demonstrating mastery of research and presentation skills.

masteryExam.topics: Covers core areas of Analysis, Algebra, and Topology.
masteryExam.passCriteria: Demonstration of deep conceptual understanding and problem-solving abilities.
